text: Tsey khto disbelieve skazaly, Hodyna nikoly ne prybude proyty!" Skazhitʹ, "Absolyutno - moyim Lordom - tse bude naybilʹsh zvychayno prybuvaty do vas. Vin yavlyaye soboyu Knower maybutnʹoho. Ne navitʹ ekvivalent vahy atomu ye prykhovanyy z Yoho, tse u nebi abo zemli. Ne navitʹ bilʹsh malyy nizh shcho, abo bilʹshyy (ye prykhovanyy). Vesʹ u hlybokomu zapysi
